snippet: The defending champion Rafael Nadal pushed aside his clay-court doldrums Friday by reaching the Madrid Open semifinals with a dominant performance against Tomas Berdych.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Tomas Berdych to reach semifinals of the Madrid Open.
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Rafael Nadal pushed aside his clay-court doldrums Friday by reaching the Madrid Open semifinals with a dominant performance against Tomas Berdych.

headline.main: Nadal Coasts on the Clay in Madrid
headline.print_headline: Nadal Coasts on the Clay in Madrid
